message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique and valuable product. I think you'll really like it. Would you like to make an offer on it?
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate the value you see in it. I would like to propose a price of $95 for the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand you're looking to get a good deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure I get a fair price for the product. Would you be willing to meet me at $105?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $100 for the product.
